snippet.title: This Is Your Laser - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Release trailer for indie game This Is Your Laser.

This is Your Laser is a two-player real-time strategy with puzzle game inspirations developed for PC. The game pits two players against each other to manipulate their laser into their opponent’s base. A polished and balanced competitive experience for both casual and core players.

Download the game here:
https://thisisyourlaser.itch.io/thisisyourlaser

Learn more at:
Website - https://thisisyourlaser.wixsite.com/thisisyourlaser
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thisisyourlaser/
Twitter - https://twitter.com/ThisIsYourLaser
